patthana12.2:4.1: Nahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:4.2: Nahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:4.3: Nahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.2:5.1: Nanahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:5.2: Nanahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:5.3: Nanahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.2:6.1: Nahetuṃ naappaccayañca nanahetuṃ naappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:6.2: Nahetuṃ naappaccayañca nanahetuṃ naappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:6.3: Nahetuṃ naappaccayañca nanahetuṃ naappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:15.1: Nahetuṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
